location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to John Hinde Pelly, Deputy Military Paymaster General, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging a communication dated 11 October 1811, which concerned retrenchments for disbursements in the Garrison Pay Office in June 1811. It notes that the batta hitherto paid was at the same rate as that issued to officers at Bussora [Basra] and Bagdad.
